name: rochasystem-central-de-apps
description: Gerenciador centralizado de scripts e integrações
author: RochaSystem

scripts.pack: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& 'C:\\Program Files\\nodejs\\node.exe' 'scripts\\make-icon.js'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; & 'C:\\Program Files\\nodejs\\node.exe' 'node_modules\\electron-packager\\bin\\electron-packager.js' . 'RochaSystem - Central de Apps' --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite --icon=favicon.ico; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; $exe = 'dist\\RochaSystem - Central de Apps-win32-x64\\RochaSystem - Central de Apps.exe'; if (-not (Test-Path $exe)) { Write-Error ('EXE não encontrado: ' + $exe); exit 1 }; & 'node_modules\\rcedit\\bin\\rcedit-x64.exe' $exe --set-icon 'app-icon.ico'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }"
